name: Chill of Foreboding
text:

Flashback {7}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

editions.flavor: "Wait . . . did you fellows hear something?"

name: Chill to the Bone

editions.flavor:

name: Chime of Night
text:
Enchant creature
When Chime of Night is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature.

editions.flavor: Many sent to serve Davvol carried such instruments, as if to remind him who their true masters were.

name: Chimeric Coils
text: {X}{1}: Chimeric Coils becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

editions.flavor: The energy that infuses the rings with life also melts them away, leaving only useless puddles of slag.

name: Chimeric Egg
text:
Whenever an opponent casts a nonartifact spell, put a charge counter on Chimeric Egg.
Remove three charge counters from Chimeric Egg: Chimeric Egg becomes a 6/6 Construct artifact creature with trample until end of turn.

name: Chimeric Idol
text: {0}: Tap all lands you control. Chimeric Idol becomes a 3/3 Turtle artifact creature until end of turn.

text:

text:
{2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 2/1 Construct artifact creature with flying.
{2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 3/2 Construct artifact creature and loses flying.

name: Chimeric Staff
text: {X}: Chimeric Staff becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature until end of turn.

editions.flavor: A snake in the grasp.
The staff unraveled in a chaotic chorus of clanging, becoming an improbable beast of hissing blades.

text:

{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

name: Chronomaton
